name: typegirl24
text: Delish

name: alanna wightman
text: I love how fresh the food tastes it's more moist than other places

name: Lauren Albert
text: Had delivered a week or so ago, forgot the sub packets and pizza sauce.

name: Logan Gillis
text: I am very pleased with the service at the Hungry Howies establishment in Highland Michigan! I called after DESPERATELY needing a slice of pie, and was greeted by a pleasant teenager named Thomas! he helped me with my order of a pineapple â€¦More

name: Michael McDermott
text: I ordered an Italian sub and although it was tasty it had a giant hole in the top of the bread so I had to just eat the filling separate from the bread. I used to manage a Hungry Howie's and that was poor expediting. I did call and speak with the manager and he was very professional and helpful.

name: T Warr
text: Friendly people. Curb-side service, pizza was made correctly & delicious

name: T Warr
text: Friendly service I have never had a problem with this location. Right now, you can go inside to pick-up, receive curb-side, you may also get regular or touch-less delivery

name: Ashlee Noodel
text: Though the pizza was pretty good the bread was not cooked all the wayðŸ˜” I love the bread.. I guess I'll have to cook it in the oven.

name: Jon Kleist
text: Friendly atmosphere. Good food. Always fast. They also do a lot for the community. Good job Mike Peterson.

name: peter paul
text: Yummy! Great customer service, great Pizza!

name: Zach Przybyla
text: BEST HUNGRY HOWIE'S IN THE AREA. super friendly staff, amazing food at great prices, and if you get delivery the drivers are super fast and super friendly.

name: brick bench
text: Nice place, got a cool lamp

name: Jeff Gallerani
text: Great pizza,friendly staff

name: Alanna Wightman
text: Very tasty

name: Matt Amin
text: Great place, they pretty much will do anything you ask them too, love the crust

name: Jon Heflin
text: Get pizza here all the time! The owner is great and supports the schools and community.

name: Tina Graves
text: Had a meat lovers and it was beyond amazing.  The extra toppings I ordered were perfect with the ranch crust.  Excellent job!!

name: Hamzah jeddin
text: Pizza tastes great and has fast service

name: Stacy Metcalf
text: Order online and was provided a 40 minute estimate. At 45 minutes they called to tell me it would be another 30 minutes. No apology. (Just so you know this is 4:45 on a Thursday) Then when I balked at the wait the person asked me â€œwhat do â€¦More

name: PATRICE MOORE
text: Takes to long and never have delivery ðŸšš person itâ€™s not worth the Hastle

name: shaun k
text: I've noticed a precipitous drop in the quality of food here, while the cost of the food continues to rise. My assumption is once the "franchise" revenue stream stops increasing then corporate start making cuts to the quality of the food to keep that profit margin green (think McDonalds). So was good 5 or so years ago, now, not so much.

name: Amanda Runion
text: Food arrive on time always and my food always hot which is a good thing. Best hungry Howie I order from.

name: christina lupro
text: I'm only giving 3 stars for the fact they changed the cheese on the calzones. This was one of my all time favorites and I'm 100% disappointed. When ordering we should have an option of our choice of cheese it seriously makes a huge â€¦More

name: John Doe
text: The best pizza around.good people and clean enviroment

name: Karen Beardsley
text: Polite professional service!

name: Carli Willett
text: Ordered pizza sent to the other side of town called when I finally got my food which was cold, they said they would remake it,but sorry I'm not going to wait til 1am to eat dinner!!!! Told I could get full order for free next time we order, â€¦More

name: Amanda Macias
text: We moved away 3 years ago. But I miss this place SO much. I have never had pizza as good as you guys make it. Aways fresh and you can tell its made with pride. Thank you!

name: Alex Paczkowski
text: Unbelievable! Ordered a calzone no lettuce or parmesan. First time there was the parmesan on it. Took it back in. Second time there was lettuce on it. Like come on why can't you fallow simple directions it's not hard. They lost me as a costumer I will never comeback here

name: R C
text: Is the quickest Hungry Howie's I've ever seen I placed a web order they say 10 minutes it's ready in 10 minutes I can place an order on my phone drive down there and it's ready for me every time I usually get pizza from Crazy Gator but I have to go to Hungry Howie's when my kids are eating

name: Raymond St Clair
text: I hate hungry howies I ate their pizza they took all the flavor out of it I am never eating hear again

text: SO GOOD YUM YUM IN MY TUM TUM

name: Joe Watkins
text: They have good food but are constantly messing up my order tonight sent my food to the other side of town to somebody else's house I won't be getting my food until 11:30 when I ordered it at 10 o'clock getting so tired of this place they really need to start getting it together up there I think I'm done with Milford Hungry Howie's
